TopicTitle: Connection nodes KSP issue - Does a fix exists ?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

does someone know if a plug-in or anything else exists to fix the issue with connections nodes ?

(If you don't know what I mean, try connection two or more Rockomax Hubmax multi point connector together with any nodes, good luck).

The biggest annoyance in this is it prevent two parts to connect together even with help of some stock structural parts like modular girders as this:

part1  girder
-----          ----------
     | ------ [   part2  
-----          ----------

connection shows by [ character doesn't work at all :/.

Tanks.

No fix, its just how KSP does nodes, something about all the nodes with the same stack label need to be going in the same direction, and the game only recognizes top and bottom for stacking...ergo, multi-connectors are wonky.
